title: superforecast
author: superforecast
created_time: September 06, 2022, 01:05:07 AMLast edit: September 06, 2022, 01:15:22 AM by superforecast
content: We built a forecasting site to help us better predict upcoming events in crypto. We poll real users in the crypto community to find their opinions on controversial topics. You can participate by voting on superforecast.co. Follow our twitter (https://twitter.com/SuperforecastCo) or join our email list to get daily results. http://superforecast.co/images/pic1.pnghttp://superforecast.co/images/pic2.png

comments.author: jovan85
comments.body: What is the purpose of this project? This is just public opinion poll. Statistics based on opinion of people.It is not certain, like for example predicting a trade based on the stock market.Also I think you are writing in the wrong thread.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: It's just like having a poll on a thread and people casting votes. It may seem useful to the newbies because they'll get the sources from almost everywhere where you've canvassed those opinions. But what if there is no more respondents for your poll? What are going to be your alternative with that? You're going to provide your own thoughts?
